text: "Sorry, No one can make Selena do anything she doesn't want to. I had a long talk with her about not working with him and it didn't click," Teefey commented below an Instagram post on her account. "Her team are amazing people. There is no fall person here. No one controls her. She makes all her own decisions. No matter how hard you try to advise. It falls on deaf ears."
title: Selena Gomez’s mom told her not to work with Woody Allen

meta_data.description: Gomez has drawn backlash for starring in the scandal-scarred Allen's new film, "A Rainy Day in New York."
